sentences.english: When the film became very exciting, Tom and Sally would hold their breath.
sentences.chinese: 電影演到激動人心處時，湯姆和薩莉就會屏住呼吸。

sentences.english: Sally, I'd like you to meet my friend, Mark.
sentences.chinese: 薩莉，我想讓你認識一下我的朋友馬克。

sentences.english: Jiamin: Look, Sally. Is that a man?
sentences.chinese: 薩莉，看。那是一個男人嗎？

sentences.english: Soon, evil spirits in the house try to take Sally to the dark side.
sentences.chinese: 不久，在家裏辟邪儘量採取薩莉的陰暗面。

sentences.english: Betoe her left to London, Swhichley send me a imagin of herself.
sentences.chinese: 薩莉動身去倫敦前送給我一張她的相片。

sentences.english: Stop grandstanding, Sally. Everyone can see you.
sentences.chinese: 別再惹人注意了，薩莉，大家都能看見你。

sentences.english: Before she left for London, Sallcdfds. com sent me a picture of herself.
sentences.chinese: 薩莉動身去倫敦前送給我一張她的照片。

sentences.english: Rhona Rogers had been friends with Sally Thompson for more than 20 years.
sentences.chinese: 羅娜“羅傑斯和薩莉”湯姆遜是20多年的朋友了。

sentences.english: Last week, my 4-year-old daughter Sally was invited to take part in a children party.
sentences.chinese: 上週，我4歲的女兒薩莉被邀請去參加一個兒童聚會。

sentences.english: Suddenly, a middle-age lady got on the train and sat opposite Sally.
sentences.chinese: 突然，一箇中年婦女上了火車，坐在薩莉的對面。

sentences.english: Sally always criticizes me on matter what I wear.
sentences.chinese: 不管我穿什麼，薩莉總是會批評的。

sentences.english: Sally, who taught you to paint your eyes like Cleopatra?
sentences.chinese: 薩莉，是誰教會你把眼睛塗得像克莉奧帕特拉？

sentences.english: A：Aunt Sally went shopping and she bought a sweater.
sentences.chinese: 薩莉阿姨去購物，她買了一件毛衣。

sentences.english: Sally thinks game shows are more educational than sitcoms.
sentences.chinese: 薩莉認爲覎遊戲節目比情景喜劇更有教育意義。

sentences.english: Lisa wishes that Gary would put his cards on the table.
sentences.chinese: 薩莉希望加里乾脆把話挑明。

sentences.english: Sally shouldn't have bought that hat. It looks terrible.
sentences.chinese: 薩莉真不該買下那頂帽子，真難看死了。
